clusterList.phrase: vladimir ilich affirmed yesterday that the proletariat as a class in the marxist sense does not exist in russia allow me to congratulate you for managing to exercise dictatorship on behalf of a class that does not actually exist

proletarian democracy of which soviet government is one of the forms has brought a development and expansion of democracy hitherto unprecedented in the world precisely for the vast majority of the population for the exploited and toiling people
preach ing pure and unadulterated socialism busi nessmen who talk this way are unwitting pup pets of the intellectual forces that have been undermining the basis of a free society these past decades
